intro.speaker: Hardin
intro.line: Princess Nyna, the Altean Army has apapeared on the opposite side of the river.

intro.speaker: Nyna
intro.line: Oh, Hardin, have they really? So Prince Marth has come...

intro.speaker: Hardin
intro.line: Finally, we can build a force to fight back. Princess, it is dangerous here. Please wait for the prince inside the fortress. Together with Altea, we will retake the castle!

visit.speaker: Old Man
visit.line: There are many treasures within the castle walls. However, if you do not have a thief in your army, you will not be able to open the chests!

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: I hear that the shops in Port Warren sell many rare items. If you plan to travel there, don't waste your gold beforehand!

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: Many foes wait inside the fortresses, ready to enter the battle. Block them so they can't get out!

visit.speaker: Young Man
visit.line: Boy! What's that look on your face? Haven't you ever seen a backwoods village like this before? Speaking of rare sights... When I was last in Pyrathi, I saw a manakete! An old man stood there, but suddenly, he turned into a dragon! What a shock... Truth told, I was scared out of my wits at the sight of it! I've heard rumors about the dragonkin, that some survived to this day. Still, I never thought I'd see a manakete with my own eyes! What are you looking at? Oh, this? I picked it up on my trip. It's unusual, this glowing stone... I have no idea what it's for, so you can have it! It makes me uncomfortable anyway. What a nice young man! I hope we can speak again.

recruit-talk.speaker: Wendell
recruit-talk.line: Prince! I am Wendell, a bishop of Khadein. We are a peaceful people. But our pleas were met only with cruelty by Gharnef as he seized the city. Thanks to his dark influence, many mages have now allied themselves with Dolhr. Please, with the strength of your forces, find a way to put an end to Gharnef's ambitions.

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: Oh! Master Wendell? Yes, it's you!

recruit-talk.speaker: Wendell
recruit-talk.line: Ah, Merric! How have you been, lad? You certainly look well.

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: I was able to find Prince Marth of Altea! And I have joined his army as well. We are fighting the tyranny of Dolhr! Why are you here, Master?

recruit-talk.speaker: Wendell
recruit-talk.line: How can I say this… Sadly, Khadein has fallen into darkness. A fiend called Gharnef has seized control. He has turned the city toward the shadow… I could not bear to serve him, so I fled on my own.

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: What awful news! Master, please… Consider lending us your strength. If Gharnef serves Dolhr, he is our enemy! We will find a way to take Khadein back. I know the prince would be overjoyed to have so great a bishop as you as an ally, Master.

recruit-talk.speaker: Wendell
recruit-talk.line: Hmm… Though I deplore violence, I cannot see another path… Very well, Merric. I will join your fight. Please let the prince know I am at his service.

end.speaker: Aurelis King
end.line: Well met, Prince Marth! Princess Nyna has taken refuge in a fortress, but you will see her soon. Many enemies await you in the castle. You face many dangers. Do be careful.
